Thank you so much for these. Amazing collection. Quick question: Are the different torrents incremental updates? In other words, does the torrent with 4,189 books overlap with this one? Or are they contain totally different books? Thanks again.

Hi there, I was wondering if you could help me out with digital text
books for my next semester. Money is getting kind of tight and it
would be simple for me to load the book onto my cell phone and follow
the instructor. I will list the books I need and if you can help me to
find the download link I will appreciate it.

I will post the title and a link for you to see the actual book for
cross reference.

1. Fundamentals of Taxation 2012, 5/e
Link: http://www.amazon.com/Fundamentals-Taxation-2012-Ana-Cruz/dp/0078025478

2. Biology 155: Introductory Biology (Laboratory Exercises in Biology)
- Custom Edition for Wayne County Community College District 2009-2010
Link: http://www.amazon.com/Biology-155-Introductory-Laboratory-Exercises/dp/073803181X/ref=sr_1_1?s=books&ie=UTF8&qid=1323660382&sr=1-1

3. Realms, Regions and Concepts, 15th Edition
Link: http://www.amazon.com/Realms-Regions-Concepts-Blij/dp/1118093607/ref=sr_1_2?s=books&ie=UTF8&qid=1323660330&sr=1-2

4. Understanding Movies, 12/E
Link: http://www.amazon.com/Understanding-Movies-12th-Louis-Giannetti/dp/0205737544/ref=sr_1_1?s=books&ie=UTF8&qid=1323660365&sr=1-1

How do you get the kindle to pick these up.  They are in zip files all in mobi format. I suppose I can unzip all of these but that would make it larger...dont want to unless necessary.  Cool reader can read the mobi files in the zip files but with the mass of books here coolreader isnt user friendly.

Actually only 1,995 books in this torrent, but still a great upload, thanks! All of the titles can be viewed by clicking on the number after 'Files:' in the torrent description at the top of this page ('2001' files in the torrent- 1,995 of them are book files).
